plot: Twenty-five years ago the Lavery baby was kidnapped. Bad guy Leffingwell gets Choya to impersonate the son to gain the Lavery estate. When he finally fesses up to his &"sister&" Ruth she is furious. To redeem himself he sets out to find the real son.   Written by  Ed Stephan
title: Marcado a fuego
plot_es: Twenty-five years ago the Lavery baby was kidnapped. Bad guy Leffingwell gets Choya to impersonate the son to gain the Lavery estate. When he finally fesses up to his &"sister&" Ruth she is furious. To redeem himself he sets out to find the real son.   Written by  Ed Stephan
